Find the output of typecasting program in Java

<html>
<head>
<title>JavaScript Data Conversion Example</title>
<script>
document.write(parseFloat('77.3') + "#");
document.write(parseInt('77')+ "#");
document.write(parseInt('123.45')+ "#");
document.write(Number("2.34")+ "#");
</script>
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>
Choose the method which Joins all elements of an array into a string
